campaigns.name: SolX Token Launch
campaigns.description: Amplify the SolX Token launch across X. Share insights, memes, and analysis about the revolutionary Solana-based token.

campaigns.name: Astra AI Revolution
campaigns.description: Join the Astra AI movement. Create content about AI agents on Solana and earn rewards for quality engagement.

campaigns.name: Quantum Drop
campaigns.description: Be part of the Quantum Drop NFT collection launch. Share your excitement and earn MSP for every valid post.

campaigns.name: Hive Launch Event
campaigns.description: Official HiveAI platform launch campaign. Help spread the word about the future of social intelligence on Solana.

campaigns.name: DeFi Summer 2.0
campaigns.description: Celebrate the return of DeFi on Solana. Share alpha, strategies, and insights about the ecosystem.

trackingInfo.trackingRule: Posts must contain BOTH #HiveAI AND the campaign-specific hashtag to be counted
